knimeNode.name: XPath
knimeNode.shortDescription: Performs a XPath query on a XML column.

fullDescription.intro: The node takes the XML Documents of the selected column and performs a XPath query on them. The node supports XPath 1.0.
fullDescription.option: The column containing the XML cells.
Name of the new column in the output table.
Check when the source column should not show up in the output table.

Choose the result type of your XPath query. The result type will be match to a KNIME type with this mapping.
Boolean -> Boolean cell type
Number -> Double cell type
String -> String cell type
Node -> XML cell type
NodeList -> Collection cell type (Collection of XML cells)

ports.inPort: Input table containing at least one XML column.
ports.outPort: The input table with additional column containing the result of the XPath query.
